content: प्रतिमानं {@--1@} A model, pattern. {@--2@} An image, idol. {@--3@} Likeness, similitude, similarity; <ls>Māl. 9. 3.</ls> {@--4@} A weight. {@--5@} The part of an elephant's head between the tusks; पृथुप्रतिमानभाग &c. <ls>Śi. 5. 36.</ls> {@--6@} A reflection. {@--7@} A picture. {@--8@} <ab>Ved.</ab> An adversary.
